alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central St. Johns and northeastern Putnam Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 525 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Federal Point, or near Hastings, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hastings, East Palatka, Federal Point, Orange Mills, Spuds and Elkton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns
